name: Unexpected Journey 奇幻之旅
description: This is your first family mission, you have to arm and equip yourself and, above all, survive attacks from deadly monsters. Defeat these strong monsters, collect 4 artifacts and emerge from this hostile island as a relic hunter.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer, 32-bit Processor: i3-2125 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 2 GB VRAM Storage: 200 MB available space
